author: Kelly Kreger
comment: This helps allot because I have to take a cab an hour away from my house, especially with all these horror story's about cab/Lyft/Uber ect.,  drivers/passengers raping and killing. So it puts us at ease a bit. And it's shows where your exact location. This is also perfect if you have kids who have their own phone and you want to keep track of where they are are going.

author: NJ E
comment: Swipe up control at bottom of screen doesn't drag up while tracking a Glympse. Or it eventually does but it takes a while trying -- Notification of a location share comes hours late, or usually just after I've stopped watching a user. -- And that has to be the ugliest widget in the Android universe.

reply.author: Glympse
reply.content: Apologies for the incorrect notes, that has now been resolved. Sorry you are having other issues, we would love to help out. Feel free to contact us at support@glympse.com and he can see what we can do!

author: Mike S
comment: This app needs a HISTORY of the entire traveled route.  It leaves a icon to "tap to view Glympse  history" that shows nothing but the user's last location when the Glympse expired (ex. parked in the drive way).  It needs to leave the user's full PATH during the course of the Glympse session.  A 'history' showing where they finally stopped after hours of traveling is useless.

author: Robbin Mote
comment: Glad to see you added hours so we didn't have to keep adding after four, but it's still short for our trips to Oregon. It'd be nice if we didn't have to add at all, open-ended. Is there a way to do that? I'd give five stars then. It's great otherwise. My mother-in-love gets mad if we don't send one to her, even when we're only traveling three hours to see her.😃

author: Alan Galpert
comment: I  enjoy using this app. It was effective to help my mother and I find each other at the train station when I visited her last. The only thing that holds this app back is that it doesn't link to Facebook or other social media to search for and message friends.

author: Nick Gascoigne
comment: Almost perfect - my wife and I use it frequently to track our separate journeys home.  The only downside is that it appears to keep running when the journey has finished, eating up resources.  I haven't found any way to exit cleanly and stop, so I have to force close the app in settings.

author: frank bachorski
comment: I used this app when I drove home to visit from San Francisco to Omaha. Mostly so it wouldn't be hard to find my body when we crashed over a cliff. Thankfully it never came to that. But I was able to keep a live feed almost the whole time. Great app 👍👍

author: Jocelyn Forsythe
comment: Using this app while driving to send location and location provided was not accurate. Showed coming from tree line then sharp turn onto roadway while maintaining vehicle on roadway the entire time. Disappointed that while trying to confirm location, the app gave inaccurate information.

author: Jeff Wallace
comment: I love this app. It integrates seamlessly with the message+ so I can quickly and easily notify other people of my location and they can reply with theirs even if they don't have the app downloaded. Solved plenty of headaches!

author: Farnam Ajamian
comment: Used to be one of the best apps. After recent upgrades on galaxy s8, it doesn't show precise location. Customer support been working on this for a month already and no solution yet. Going to uninstall. Not the fantastic app thst used to be anymore.

author: Laurie keeler
comment: I use this app when I'm on my way somewhere it's very accurate in showing my location. It's also just a fun app when I'm walking to the store or running my errands to show Family where I am, the only thing that would make 6his app perfect is if there was a way to always share access of my location. Google maps I'm able to open it and check where a family member is with out having to send a request.

author: Austin Smith
comment: This is a great app that I like more as I use it more! I do wish, though, that when sharing with friends it have a "done" option instead of having to go back. It seems somewhat offputting because in other apps it may not save those choices.

author: Shafiq Mumani
comment: Can't sort favourites so when you add one, it goes on top instead of last. Would be great to sort your favourites (recipients). When I try to drag it as it seems possible, Glympse crashes. Otherwise, it seems to be a really great app.

author: Richard Goerwitz
comment: Works fine for small family groups.  In larger work, social, or gaming settings, however, it can be creepy because of how difficult it is to suppress visibility of last-known locations.  Most users don't even realize that the app shows their last-known location when the sharing finishes.

author: Michelle Wagner
comment: I love this app ..... I have to travel around alot and some roads aren't the safest so knowing my husband can check on me to make sure I'm ok makes my heart happy! I'm trying to show our firefighters how to use the app so they know where each person is or truck is when fighting grass fires!

author: Lucy J
comment: I use this a few times per week when my husband and I are trying to pick each other up from functions and work. It's awesome and saves a lot of time standing around waiting for someone.

author: James Adams
comment: Not sure how this got any good reviews. It does nothing correctly. Makes me the wrong person, says I'm travelling when I'm sitting still,requests location info from me, to me.

author: Caroline Gordon
comment: I love this app for so many reasons.  Being able to let people know where I am when traveling in sketchy weather or just in general in case something happens.  Another reason is I had to get a locksmith to unlock my car but there was no address where I was so I just sent him a glympse and he found me with no problems.  One problem I have now that I didn't have before is that my speed doesn't register anymore. It just says 0.0.

author: Jaxon Hollis
comment: Great app. Add choice for open-end (or not limited time) let I can share my position how long time I want. Thank you.

author: A Google User
comment: It is not as easy to see your Glympse  friends converging as it should be. It should really have a usability pass. Hey Glympse call me ;-).  Seriously, you need a friend who knows UI.

author: Paul Mankus
comment: Great way to keep someone informed of your progress. Very useful in my business of tuning pianos. Customers will usually let me know if I missed a turn  LOL
Location updates are intermittent, sometimes it updates every few seconds, sometimes it doesn't update at all. The whole route has good cell coverage.

author: sidney mcclain
comment: location can be inaccurate  sometimes. The location marker jumps around the map when moving, instead following a route fluidly.

author: jenny hunsperger
comment: I love this app so much! I use it all the time! It's so much easier than asking someone where they are every 10 minutes or having to answer a bunch of texts about when you're going to be somewhere.

author: TheDjChook
comment: It's great to keep track but there should be a tutorial when you first download so you can learn the system instead of figuring it out ourselves

author: Alana Nimmo
comment: Would not accurately show locations.  It would show a person stopped while they were moving.  App would be great if it workef

author: Cat Dalton
comment: Never updates your location.  It used to be great.  I have an android and I have had problems since at least December 2017.

author: Louise Wiedmer
comment: It's not working properly. It's not showing the right path, it's showing alot of back tracking, and not on the right roads.

author: John Thornton
comment: This app is FANTASTIC when making a long trek to visit family for them to see how you're doing.  I enjoy the peace of mind it gives my wife when I go riding.

author: Brian Fogarty
comment: Reliable app. Like to use it for family tracking. Would like it to automatically share group member locations when GPS is on. You have to request location instead.

author: Michelle Wardell
comment: This app is great when I'm traveling so my husband can follow me on my way to pick up my dad every few weeks in California. Love it

author: Norman Hilton
comment: Useless until they fix the screen timing out whilst driving as It's against the law here in the UK.

author: Roman Alexander
comment: Switch to Waze.  My fiancé, and travel a lot and used Glimpse for a several years. The updates made over the last year have destroyed the functionality of Glimpse.
I use to love this app but since last week I cannot change the order of my pick up anymore because when I try it closes the app

author: Brian Danihel
comment: Great app! I love how this allows your friends and family to see where you are during long drives. It takes a while to share your location link with multiple people though. It would be nice if it was possible to select multiple contacts and send out the exact same link to all of them at once. Also, please stop asking me to rate the app... I already have twice now! Over all, this is a must have app!

author: A Google User
comment: I love it, although sometimes it takes up to five minutes to get updated view of shared glympse but it works well.

author: K W
comment: It's so fun and helps me feel safe to be able to share my location with friends and family!

author: Ramy Omar
comment: It works, my parole officers can track me and they can even tell how fast I'm moving not just where I'm heading.

author: Ruby Wolfe
comment: I uesd it it because my spouse had an amazing it put a lot of things that need to be in the open on my defense and his not so good so the app is worth more than what it mentions  lol let's just say I I got the upper hand and that made me feel like a brand new person and I didn't blame myself anymore  love this app

author: Jan Melara
comment: Great way to let people know your location for a specified period of time  Works with Ford Sync3.
